name: SecRequirementType
desc: An enumeration indicating different types of internal requirements for code.

items.name: case hostRequirementType
items.desc: What hosts may run this code.

items.name: case guestRequirementType
items.desc: What guests this code may run.

items.name: case libraryRequirementType
items.desc: What libraries this code may link against.

items.name: case pluginRequirementType
items.desc: What plug-ins this code may load.

items.name: static var requirementTypeCount: SecRequirementType
items.desc: The number of valid requirement types.
